dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Ruled margins: side margins are numbered 1 to 22 -- top, bottom, and center margins are lettered a to q.
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, places of historical interest.
Includes illustrations throughout of settlements, people, and bibical events.
Descriptive text throughout: Ierusalem, et suburbia eius, sicut tempore Christi floruit, cu locis, in quib' Christ pass' ...
Appears in Braun and Hogenberg's Civitates orbis terrarum, Koeln, 1588. Vol IV No. 58-9. First Latin edition.
